experiences.title: Senior Manager, Software Engineering
experiences.description: As a Senior Software, Engineering Manager for Cox Automotive I lead multiple on and off shore teams who support and engineer some of our highest volume APIs that provide unique payment service capabilities for the automotive industry. I provide organizational and architectural leadership, partner with our product and program management teams to ensure successful delivery of features for customers while maintaining high resilience and quality for our payment platforms.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description: As a Senior Software Engineer I work directly with Viant's ad server runtime systems which execute high-volume, low-latency transactions that process billions of unique requests a day. I interact with senior product leadership to help define and prioritize requirements necessary for delivering quality features that perform with high availability and reliability utilizing Golang, SQL, and Java along with a number of popular frameworks.

experiences.title: Chief Technology Officer
experiences.description: Responsible for leading Platform, Feature, DevOps and Reliability Engineering for EPSoft's flagship SaaS platform. My role includes participation in hands-on execution of key features, platform modules, DevOps, and SRE implementations. Partnering with Executive Leadership for sales, customer success, product, and marketing to ensure our products and services remain competitive, scale to support anticipated usage, and that our messaging aligns to our capabilities. Under my leadership, we have built programs to cultivate intrinsic motivation, establish team performance metrics, and mature our infrastructure-as-code capabilities for our cloud environments.

experiences.title: Director - Core Systems Modernization
experiences.description: Provided leadership to application development teams focused on modernizing core systems from legacy technology platforms to modern Cloud ready architectures and platforms. Collaborated with legacy technology teams to modernize skill sets, migrate to an agile software development methodology, and implement modern application systems. Served as Principal Architect for Event Driven Microservice and Cloud ready solutions. Successfully led the systems modernization architecture team through the merger of TSYS and Global Payments.

experiences.title: Director, Application System Development for Big Data
experiences.description: Principal architect and leader of the technical team responsible for implementation and support of a Big Data platform. Led a global technology team that delivered a Big Data platform while achieving a near realtime data ingestion pipeline capable of supporting multi-billion ingestion events per day. This single platform can support both Analytics/OLAP with modern tools such as Apache Hive and Spark while also achieving sub-second OLTP response times utilizing Apache HBase.

experiences.title: Associate Director - Application System Development
experiences.description: Leader of technical resources responsible for architecture, implementation, and support of Emerging Technologies, Data Warehouse, and Automated Testing utilizing Agile delivery methodologies. Substantially improved the technical and behavioral skills of the team which measurably increased code coverage and decreased resources needed for manual testing. Led a dramatic shift toward more progressive technologies to deliver faster and high-impact results.

experiences.title: Manager - Automation and Business Intelligence
experiences.description: Team leader of technical resources responsible for automated data validation of the implementations development that is used to onboard new clients to business platforms. Designed, implemented and maintained the operational data warehouse associated with platform implementation. Responsibilities included, performance evaluation of team members and guidance for their professional growth, as well as, financial management of technical software resources.

experiences.title: Manager - Business Systems
experiences.description: Requirements management and functional design lead for the Loan Origination System as well as system manager for Sales and Service, Deposit Origination, Loan Origination, Teller and Service Request platforms. Managed the technology vendor and the software development life cycle, executive and sponsor management for Platform initiatives while maintaining positive relationships with internal customers.

experiences.title: Senior Business Analyst
experiences.description: Define Functional Requirements for SOA (Web Service) integrations, participate in the definition of the technology Solution Framework, and establish the criteria for the Business Analyst role in the Software Development Life Cycle.

experiences.title: Information Technology Architect
experiences.description: Lead technical team in company culture and performance expectations. Head of strategic direction for Open Source technologies. Control, manage and deliver high impact and highly visible business projects.

experiences.title: Business Development Manager
experiences.description: Identified potential clients and managed the sales process for each prospect. Worked closely with senior management to establish pricing and services offered. Established metrics and benchmarks for sales performance by implementing the 'Solution Selling' strategy. Oversaw marketing budget and tracked marketing partner performance.

experiences.title: Senior Programmer Analyst
experiences.description: Peer-leader for development teams and design system architecture. Develop solutions for customer facing e-commerce websites which interact real-time with servicing system.
